products.title: Hazelnut Flavored Arabica Coffee Ground, Medium Roast, 340 Gr
products.description: Fragrant medium-light roast with toasted hazelnut flavor One 12-ounce bag of ground coffee 100% Arabica coffee grown in Central and South America Roasted and packed in the U.S.A.

comment.comment: To an old man a cup of coffee is like the door post of an old house — it sustains and strengthens him.
Coffee makes us severe, and grave, and philosophical.
I orchestrate my mornings to the tune of coffee.

products.title: Dark Roast Ground Coffee - Major Dickason's Blend 510 Gr Bag
products.description: Major Dickason`s Blend: Conceived by Mr. Peet and his most discerning customer, Major Dickason’s Blend has become the coffee that epitomizes the rich, flavorful taste of Peet`s Flavor and Roast: Incomparable world blend, rich, complex, and full-bodied. Dark roast. 100% Arabica Coffee

comment.comment: People say money can’t buy happiness. They Lie. Money buys Coffee, Coffee makes Me Happy!

products.title: Veranda Blend Light Blonde Roast Ground Coffee 340 Gr (Pack of 6)
products.description: PREMIUM GROUND COFFEE —Starbucks delivers exceptional coffee cup after cup with this 12-ounce bag of Veranda Blend lightly roasted ground coffee—6 bags total VERANDA BLEND—Our lightest roasted coffee with notes of toasted malt and baking chocolate FRESH TASTE—Starbucks.

products.title: Pour Over Coffee Maker with Permanent Filter, 1 Liter, 34 Ounce Black Band
products.description: Pour over Coffee: manual pour over Coffee maker allows you to brew an excellent cup of Coffee in minutes Stainless steel: includes a Permanent, stainless steel mesh filter that helps extract your coffee's aromatic oils and subtle flavors instead of being absorbed by a paper filter.
